name: azboards-roadmaps
description: Azure Boards IT Research and Prototyping Roadmaps
author: ESDC IT RP

scripts.compile:dev: npm run clean && webpack --mode development --config webpack.dev.config.js
scripts.package: npm run compile && tfx extension create --manifest-globs azure-devops-extension.json src/**/azure-devops-extension.json --overrides-file configs/release.json --output-path out
scripts.package:dev: npm run compile:dev && tfx extension create --manifest-globs azure-devops-extension.json src/**/azure-devops-extension.json --overrides-file configs/dev.json --output-path out
scripts.publish: npm run compile && tfx extension publish --manifest-globs azure-devops-extension.json src/**/azure-devops-extension.json --overrides-file configs/release.json --output-path out
scripts.publish:dev: npm run compile:dev && tfx extension publish --manifest-globs azure-devops-extension.json src/**/azure-devops-extension.json --overrides-file configs/dev.json --output-path out
